Background:

In his 1995 paper WaveLab and Reproducible Research David L Donoho is making a case for reproducible research. About 15 years laters, Donoho is re-evaluating the situation of reproducible research in the paper 15 Years of Reproducible Research in Computational Harmonic Analysis.

Based on these two papers, write a blog post discussing the commonalities and changes in the themes and solutions.

Instructions:

Go to https://github.com/Stat585-at-ISU/blog for instructions about how to prepare and submit your blog post.
